entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Delta
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
